docs.snippet: Hundreds of protesters rallied on Sunday against Hong Kong's disqualification of six candidates from legislative elections, the latest outpouring of anger at a perceived tightening grip on the city's freedoms by China....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of protesters rallied on Sunday against Hong Kong's disqualification of six candidates from legislative elections, the latest outpouring of anger at a perceived tightening grip on the city's freedoms by China.

headline.main: Hundreds Swelter in Hong Kong Protests at Perceived Election Meddling
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Swelter in Hong Kong Protests at Perceived Election Meddling

docs.snippet: His message resonates with voters who feel guns are all they have....
docs.lead_paragraph: His message resonates with voters who feel guns are all they have.
docs.abstract: Campaign Stops column by Daniel Hayes describes how his hometown of Middlesboro, Ky, has declined over past two decades and explains allure Donald Trump candidacy holds for many in area; notes while outsourcing and guns are twin issues animating most of Trump's supporters, many of them feel that fighting gun control is only issue in which they have political agency.

docs.snippet: How we helped politicians stop taking themselves so seriously, for better or worse....
docs.lead_paragraph: How we helped politicians stop taking themselves so seriously, for better or worse.
docs.abstract: Campaign Stops column by Tabitha Soren reflects on being political reporter for MTV News during 1990s; notes '90s nostalgia is everywhere, particularly apt trend given fact another Clinton is running for president; notes degree to which news media has moved in direction MTV News pioneered, even though MTV was mocked widely at time, and suggests MTV News inadvertantly helped turn politics into entertainment.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton and the Ghosts of MTV

docs.snippet: A senior aide to U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump signaled a possible shift in his hardline immigration policies on Sunday, saying his plans to deport 11 million people who are in the country illegally were under review....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior aide to U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump signaled a possible shift in his hardline immigration policies on Sunday, saying his plans to deport 11 million people who are in the country illegally were under review.

headline.main: Trump Campaign Signals Possible Shift on Immigration Stance
headline.print_headline: Trump Campaign Signals Possible Shift on Immigration Stance

docs.snippet: Lonnie Bunch leans forward to peer inside a slave cabin from Edisto Island, South Carolina. The dark and cramped interior defies his attempts to showcase the small living space its occupants subsisted on....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lonnie Bunch leans forward to peer inside a slave cabin from Edisto Island, South Carolina. The dark and cramped interior defies his attempts to showcase the small living space its occupants subsisted on.

headline.main: Sneak Peek of New Smithsonian Shows Rich Black History
headline.print_headline: Sneak Peek of New Smithsonian Shows Rich Black History
